questions.question_text: A material finding related to the integrity of personal data was discovered during a privacy audit. Which of the following should the IT privacy practitioner do FIRST?

choices.A: Discuss the matter with the board.
choices.D: Update the associated data privacy policy.
choices.C: Draft a corrective plan for management.
choices.B: Determine the impact to data subjects.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. Determine the impact to data subjects.
B. Determine the impact to data subjects.

questions.question_text: At a minimum, records metadata in data retention files should include:

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Including the record creation date in metadata is essential for effective data retention management.

choices.A: Preventing users from using incorrect private keys
choices.B: Protecting the confidentiality and authenticity of private keys
choices.D: Protecting the confidentiality and authenticity of public keys
choices.C: Preventing users from using incorrect public keys

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the MOST important key management practice when deploying cryptography for protecting personal data?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
private keys are critical in cryptography as they are used for decrypting data or signing messages, ensuring their confidentiality and authenticity is essential to prevent unauthorized access, tampering, or misuse.

choices.B: Implementing a detailed system of records process
choices.A: Implementing a data quality governance process
choices.D: Designing a robust data loss prevention (DLP) process
choices.C: Developing a clear data forensics process

questions.question_text: Which of the following BEST facilitates an organizationâ€™s ability to achieve data privacy-related goals?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
a data quality governance process ensures that personal data is accurate, consistent and reliable across the organization
Answer is A. Data quality governance ensures that the personal data an organization collects, processes, and stores is accurate, consistent, and reliable.
I wonder why people are saying D, governance facilitates everything. Answer A.,

Selected Answer: D
A DLP is a definitive control for ensuring data privacy. Data Quality governance has to deal with the accuracy and integrity of the data.

Selected Answer: D
for example, the legal team may require training on regulatory compliance, while the IT team may need guidance on secure data handling

Answer is C. Including mandatory awareness training as part of performance evaluations ensures that all employees recognize the importance of privacy and are held accountable for their knowledge and actions regarding data privacy. This integration into performance evaluations encourages active participation and fosters a culture of privacy awareness throughout the organization.

Selected Answer: D
D. Customizing awareness training by business unit function

The answer should be D. A only focus on the privacy team while the question asks at organizational level. Customizing the training for each business unit so that they can understand their part and how privacy issues relate to their department is the best way.

choices.C: Including mandatory awareness training as part of performance evaluations
choices.A: Funding in-depth training and awareness education for data privacy staff
choices.B: Implementing an annual training certification process
choices.D: Customizing awareness training by business unit function

questions.question_text: Which of the following is the MOST effective way to support organizational privacy awareness objectives?
